name: Food photography
description: Photography that focuses on food, or uses food as a photographic subject in its expression of a non-food related idea.

name: Lifestyle photography
description: Photography trends pop in and out of the spotlight often, but lately there’s a style of photography that’s been on everyone’s radar: lifestyle photography.

name: Product photography
description: This comprehensive guide to product photography will help you to understand what product photography is, what you need to be a successful product photographer, and potential markets for your work.

name: Event photography
description: An event photographer specializes in taking pictures of large-scale or important events, such as weddings, corporate meetings, athletic competitions, or shows.

name: Corporate team photography
description: They say a picture is worth a thousand words, but did you know you need less than 40 to complete standard photo descriptions?

name: Social media photography
description: Social media is a powerful tool to build your business. Read our guide to social media photography and take your social media presence to the next level!
